channel.title: About the Gluon on Xen
channel.description:
I had no Idea where to post this, hopefully it fits around here.
I really liked how the Gluon Gun was used in the later sections of Xen but i couldn't help but notice a missed opportunity for when the Gluon gets supercharged.
As you know the Gluon Gun has a display monitoring its status. So, wouldn't it be cool if the screen's readings changed as the gun becomes engulfed by green crystal energy?
It's a relatively small detail, but I believe it would greatly increase immersion while making it easier to understand what is happening to the gun.
What are your thoughts on this?
